articles.title: Sri Lanka win dramatic first ODI as brave Proteas' run chase falls short - SuperSport
articles.description: A victory target of 301 proved just too much after a brave South African run chase in which Aiden Markram (96) and Rassie van der Dussen (59) played valiant roles in their opening ODI.
